@eterglax


Read the whole .txt.There is a solution for your problem in there.Anyway read this:

1 Make your pc show hidden folders. To do so, go to control panel, go to folder options, click view tab and check hidden folders. works on xp, vista and 7.
2 now go to c:\ProgramData and there you will find a folder named esellerate. Copy that folder.
3 for the people who run two operating systems, the folder should be pasted in c\ programfiles[x86] (if running fsx on windows xp) or d/ program files (if running fsx on windows 7 or vista)
4 for the people who run single operating system either 7, vista or xp should paste the folder in program files directory.
5 you have now solved the problem permanently.

To solve the freezing problem in the cockpit you have to be connected to the internet in order to activate, which automatically use to. Then, it will work.

I am trying to fix the internet connecting problem ad as soon as I do I will write the solution.

Another reason is that, if you have installed other addons that require esellerate validation
cause cocorde x to register.

To solve this (maybe it will help)
Uninstall cocorde x
search for esellerate in the whole system.
If found any delete it to recyclebin, not permaently.
Install concorde X and you are done.

http://www.flightsimlabs.com/aircraft/concorde-x/concorde-x-faq-troubleshooting/

Take a look at this also,
These problems are not only in pirated version but also in original copy.

If your concorde crashes or freezes for the first time.

try disabling data execution prevention (DEP).
This may too help a lot.

Request: PMDG 747 400F

For those having crashes you have to disable DEP with this CMD command:

bcdedit.exe /set {current} nx AlwaysOff

Quit CMD and restart.

good everything apart from everything made my flight sim labs. for me, i had to do the bcdedit.exe /set {current} nx AlwaysOff in order to make the aircraft/fsx stability last more than a second once i had entered the simulator, it keeps downloading the config file EVERY time you select the aircraft, you cant navigate any ware because it doesn't give you a map, some panels don't work, tiny frame rate, massive memory demand. just avoid this or buy the actual thing to make it all work. i just wish that it works.
